document_data.caption: A map showing Wyvern Road in northwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Wyvern Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Wyvern Road''' was a street located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Wyvern Road originated at Zhentil Keep's [[Trail Gate]], taking over for the [[Zhentilar Trail]] inside the city walls. The road terminated at the unnamed gate that allowed passage into the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]. Wyvern Road was located in northwest Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. Wyvern Road was part of a large convergence of other roads in Zhentil Keep that formed a large intersection just east of the Trail Gate. The other roads were [[Border Street]], [[Fortress Street]], [[Cobble Road]], and [[Nool Street]].
document_data.Description: The road ran roughly west to east.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* The Trail Gate
* A [[Zhentilar]] guard post
